Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2009 04:00PM Jeanne44 wrote: I just had a bilat also and was thinking about getting a tattoo.  Don't know yet whether I will need chemo yet though.  I'm thinking maybe something artsy like a Japanese ocean scene, but haven't decided yet.  Barbara - thank you so much for starting the BreastFree website.  It is very inspirational.  I am leaning more toward going without reconstruction or prostheses myself.  It is great to read about other women who are considering these questions too.  The photos are really helpful.  Jeanne
Posts.Title: Helpful photos for young women considering no reconstruction Erica Jeanne44
